titleStmt.title: A submissive and petitionary letter subscribed. To the right Honourable the Lords of Parliament, in the upper House of Parliament assembled. And intituled The humble submission and supplication of the Lord Littleton, Lord Keeper of the Great Seale of England.
titleStmt.author: Littleton, Edward Littleton, Lord, 1589-1645.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: September 28. 1642. Your Lordships humble servant and suppliant, E. L.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
